definition.name: Checkbox
definition.description: A custom checkbox component built on top of Radix UI's Checkbox primitive. It provides a stylized, accessible checkbox input that can be toggled between checked and unchecked states. The component includes visual feedback for different states including focus, disabled, and checked states.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the checkbox

checked.description: The controlled checked state of the checkbox

defaultChecked.description: The default checked state when initially rendered

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the checkbox

onCheckedChange.description: Event handler called when the checked state changes

interactions: Can be clicked to toggle between checked and unchecked states
Can be focused using keyboard navigation
Displays a checkmark icon when checked
definition.visualLayout: A square checkbox input that displays a checkmark icon when checked. The checkbox has a border in its default state and fills with the primary color when checked. It includes visual indicators for focus state and becomes semi-transparent when disabled.
definition.implementationNotes: Built using Radix UI's Checkbox primitive for accessibility and enhanced functionality. Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Implements React.forwardRef to allow ref forwarding to the underlying checkbox element.
